headline: The Biggest Speech of Kamala Harris’s Life
description: Kamala Harris will formally accept her party’s presidential nomination at the Democratic National Convention, presenting her vision for the country and highlighting her economic policy agenda.

headline: Canada ended its brief rail shutdown

headline: R.I.P. Sphen, the penguin who became a gay icon
